text.section: One of the citizen members selected under subsection (b) of this section shall have an expertise in bicycle and pedestrian safety.
The total membership of the Committee may not exceed 22 members.
The Governor shall select a chairman from among the citizen members.

section.section: The term of a member is 4 years.
The terms of members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Committee on October 1, 2001.
At the end of a term, a member continues to serve until a successor is appointed and qualifies.
A member who is appointed after a term has begun serves only for the rest of the term and until a successor is appointed and qualifies.

text.section: The Committee may adopt procedures necessary to ensure the orderly transaction of business.
The Committee shall hold regular meetings as it deems appropriate.
A member of the Committee may not receive compensation but shall be reimbursed for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided for in the State budget.
The Department shall provide staff, administrative support, and operating expenses for the Committee as provided in the State budget.
